channel.title: How make npc walking?
channel.description:
I tried this :
Autospawn.cfg -> spawn = 2313 3189 3277 0 3189 3277 3191 3278 1. ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ . 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 . 1: NpcID. 2: CoordX. 3: CoordY. I think 4-7 is walk location X/Y to X/Y. 4: Up left corner CoordX. 5: Up left corner CoordY. 6: Under right corner CoordX. 7: Under right corner CoordY. but when i Compile and login i dont see them walk. All npc just stand and dont move how can i fix this?
Please help me!! :D

item.title: How make npc walking?
item.dc:creator: @maxxy2 maxxy2
item.description:
@maxxy2 wrote:

i think it should be under left and upper right. just like nonWild boolean areas.

Read full topic

item.title: How make npc walking?
item.dc:creator: @sjoerdieman sjoerdieman
item.description:
@sjoerdieman wrote:

I tried this :

Autospawn.cfg -> spawn = 2313 3189 3277 0 3189 3277 3191 3278 1.
^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ .
1 2 3 4 5 6 7 .
1: NpcID.
2: CoordX.
3: CoordY.
I think 4-7 is walk location X/Y to X/Y.
4: Up left corner CoordX.
5: Up left corner CoordY.
6: Under right corner CoordX.
7: Under right corner CoordY.
but when i Compile and login i dont see them walk.
All npc just stand and dont move how can i fix this?

Please help me!!

Read full topic
